title: The Small Business Perspective: How Owners Are Dealing With Worker Shortages, Inflation and Supply Chain Delays
description: Goldman Sachs’ Joe Wall of the Office of Government Affairs explains why small business owners’ sentiment has turned sharply negative as the pandemic continues and host Allison Nathan speaks with three business owners about their current experiences.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Goldman Sachs’ Joe Wall of the Office of Government Affairs explains why small business owners’ sentiment has turned sharply negative as the pandemic continues and host Allison Nathan speaks with three business owners about their current experiences.
